answers.answer: HI,The parameters of healthy babies are often larger than smaller ones. A difference of two weeks is acceptable if no abnormality is found. Large mothers usually have large babies. Also it is necessary to rule out diabetes in the mother. Consult your gynaecologist. Hope this helps.Take care and good luck.
well I went for sonogram at 20 weeks and it seems to be very accurate from my 6week ultrasound just 3days off. am I sapposed to be at least 2weeks off for health baby?

question: if your 18weeks pregnant  and you go in to a sonogram to see if your baby haseverything at that time. is it possible your baby can be as if features were that as of a 20week baby?basicly can a baby be 2weeks more developed than what it should be at 18weeks?
title: 18 weeks pregnant question
